title: Green synthesis of silver nanoparticles from Manilkara zapota leaf extract for the detection of aminoglycoside antibiotics and other applications
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23240-23256
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01906G, Paper

Khushboo Sahu, Ramsingh Kurrey, Ajai Kumar Pillai
Antibiotics of aminoglycoside (AMG) class, such as streptomycin (STR), have been widely used to treat infectious diseases caused by Gram-negative bacteria in livestock and humans.
